definition: door/doorman (old)/hanger-on of an aristocrat/social influence/pull/classifier for relatives, marriages etc

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(coll.) (emphasizing a rhetorical question) what/what kind/why on earth
see 走門路|走门路[zou3 men2 lu4]

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 笔者已经详细的了解了西门子软件的安全漏洞在哪里。

sentences.english: I don't know what hit me.
sentences.chinese: 不晓得我撞了哪门子邪。

sentences.english: Della, being slender , had mastered the art.
sentences.chinese: 德拉身材苗条，已精通了这门子艺术。

sentences.english: Siemens electrical appliances, specialized in optical glass.
sentences.chinese: 西门子电器，专业无花光学玻璃。

sentences.english: Power engineering quickly became a second pillar of Siemens'worldwide business.
sentences.chinese: 电力工程很快成为西门子全球业务的第二大支柱业务。

sentences.english: Please pay attention to our website for more information.
sentences.chinese: 更多征文活动信息，请留意西门子网站。

sentences.english: Della, being slender, had mastered the art.
sentences.chinese: 德拉身材苗条，已精通了这门子艺术。

sentences.english: Do you know anything the new Siemen system?
sentences.chinese: 你知道新的西门子系统？

sentences.english: Her dark hair waved untidy across her broad forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她的黑发散乱地飘拂在宽阔的脑门子上。

sentences.english: But what kind of a utopia is it which is kept by force?
sentences.chinese: 但这是那门子的乌托邦，要靠武力维持？

sentences.english: I'm sorry, how is this a win?
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，这是那门子的赢局？

sentences.english: What kind of hero does that?
Which part of Manifest Destiny does sneaking under EastChina Sea belong?
sentences.chinese: 鬼鬼祟祟的去东海这又算是哪门子天定命运？

sentences.english: Siemens is helping Shanghai and China do this.
sentences.chinese: 而西门子正助力上海和中国达成这一目标。

sentences.english: The stock was also upgraded to “conviction buy” from “buy” at Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 高盛集团也把西门子股票评级从买入上调为强势买入。

definition: forced labor of feudal tenant (corvée)/bailiff of feudal yamen
to hang on to and serve the rich and powerful by literary hack work etc
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
